section.title: Tutorial Assumptions
section.para: The TicketMonster application is built on a Maven-based Java EE Web project. To ensure successful completion of the tutorial, a number of assumptions are made about your system:

listitem.para: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6 is installed.
Maven is installed and configured for JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6 but it is not configured for JBoss Developer Studio.

note.para: If you wish to use JBoss Application Server 7.1 instead of JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6, you may install it and you should modify all the references to JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6 in this tutorial accordingly.
